𒁹 should have a numeric value of 5 (1,a,b,c,d?) because
𒁹 could have a numeric value of 10 because 𒁹•≈10 ≈ daš ≈ deca ≈ 10 (decimal dichem 25 )
𒁹𒁹 ≈ 𐎕 ≈ 𒈫 ≈ 𜎄 Zain 10 ≈ 𒁹+𒀸 ≈ 十 shí ( shu+yi 丨一 )
𒍝 ća wie 𐎇 CETA 𒈫 second 𐎕 Sade Zain 𐎑ZU 𐏂SSA

𒁹 dash belongs to a series of number (lacking from unicode) 𒁹 dent : 𒁹 ≈ 𓎆 ≈ 𒌋 10 graphically also other nicks, notches and scores 𒐕 g̃eš₂ “sixty” 𒌋 u “ten” i.e. 60×10 𒄑𒈫 30*2 ĝeš₂ 𒐕 g̃eš ≈ soiš ≈ soix in soixante : 𒐕 𒌋𒐊 soixante-dix-cinq 75 french counting
